title: Aram recall bug
body:
If you press b in aram,your champ will recall but he will not teleport to base.
Please fix

replies.body: k ima test this, but honestly no, dont fix it. thats like ultimate bm, ima do it

Hiya! 

This is actually working as intended. :) For players who only play ARAM, they also deserve to see the recalls on their skins. ^-^
You can't recall in Aram. About a year ago Riot added the recall animations on the map so people can still see/use them, but you can't actually recall.

Then don't press b? People almost never proc the recall animations anyways. 

Recall serves no purpose in ARAM. You can't heal or purchase at base as soon as you leave it.
Recall isn't supposed to work in aram
